items: All Artisan Goods except for Oil which is disliked, and Void Mayonnaise which is hated
All Cooking except for Fried Egg and Bread which are neutral, and Strange Bun which is hated
All Flowers except for Poppy which is hated
All Gems except for Prismatic Shard which is loved
All Vegetables except for Wheat and Hops which are neutral
All Fish except for Clam which is neutral, and Carp and Snails which are hated
All Crafted Lighting except for Jack-O-Lantern whic his disliked
All Miscellaneous Crafted Items except for Iron and Gold Bar which are disliked
All Furniture except for Tea Set which is disliked
All Monster Loot except for Solar and Void Essence which are disliked
All Trash except for Driftwood which is disliked
